response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which we believe would significantly enhance your business operations and elevate your market position. We understand the value this product holds for you, estimated at $1,000,000, and we are excited to offer it to you at a special introductory price of $950,000. This offer represents an exceptional value proposition, allowing you to maximize your investment while gaining a competitive edge in your industry. We look forward to discussing how this product can contribute to your success.", "product_price": 950000}
